EventsDetail.BodyCopy:
Uniform and Equipment

Required equipment

BYU-Idaho helmet with full face mask and current HECC certification (Players must wear helmets provided by BYU-Idaho), padded hockey pants, shin pads, cup, elbow pads, shoulder pads, stick, gloves, skates, throat/neck protector, dental guard.

Equipment provided by BYU-Idaho:

Helmet, shoulder pads, pants, shin pads, elbow pads, throat/neck protector, gloves and all goalkeeper's equipment.

Player must provide the following equipment:

Cup, skates, stick, tape, dental guard (skates are available to rent at the ice rink, some tape and dental guards are available to purchase in the issue room, sticks are available to checkout)

Team uniform consists of

Black BYU-Idaho helmet, Jersey, Team Socks and Black Pants (must be indentical in color for each member of the team)

Participation Fee: $25 - includes t-shirt

Rules-- Modifications

We use NFHS high school rules with the following modifications.

20 minute running time periods, no body-checking, no slap shots above the waist.
